<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>On submit validation</name><order/><script><![CDATA[// System generated script, please do not change
function onSubmit() {
   var tableName = g_form.getTableName();
   if (tableName == 'sc_req_item' || tableName == 'sc_task')
      return true;
   else
      return BlueprintSCClient.beforeSubmitCloudRsrcTemplate(g_form);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-04-01 08:34:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8b50ca535b7b0010720b1ec76981c729</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>On submit validation</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="CPG Resource Operations Filter" source="sn_cpg_filter">0f7fa6a25b330010720b1ec76981c7de</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CPG Resource Operations Filter">0f7fa6a25b330010720b1ec76981c7de</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_8b50ca535b7b0010720b1ec76981c729</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-04-01 08:34:59</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
